keyMoments.title: Battle Against Marines at Harbor
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates engage Hina's Marine forces at the Eastern Port while waiting for Vivi.

keyMoments.title: Silent Farewell to Vivi
keyMoments.description: The entire crew participates in the iconic X mark gesture, silently confirming that Vivi will always be one of them.

keyMoments.title: Departure from Alabasta
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats sail away from Alabasta on the Going Merry, marking the end of the Arabasta Arc.

reveals.information: Vivi is confirmed as an eternal honorary member of the crew despite not physically joining, symbolized by the X mark
